mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM dq_d_data
state != -1
and volume_label = #{volume_label}
order by sid
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO dq_d_data
(volume_label, project_name, record_content, tape_number, data_quantity, inline_range, crossline_range, inline_position, crossline_position, x_position, y_position, record_length, use_interval, filing_unit, filing_date, remarks, state, create_date)
VALUES
(#{volume_label}, #{project_name}, #{record_content}, #{tape_number}, #{data_quantity}, #{inline_range}, #{crossline_range}, #{inline_position}, #{crossline_position}, #{x_position}, #{y_position}, #{record_length}, #{use_interval}, #{filing_unit}, #{filing_date}, #{remarks}, #{state}, #{create_date})
mapper.update:
update dq_d_data set project_name = #{project_name} , record_content = #{record_content}, tape_number = #{tape_number} , data_quantity = #{data_quantity}, inline_range = #{inline_range} , crossline_range = #{crossline_range}, inline_position = #{inline_position}, crossline_position = #{crossline_position}, x_position = #{x_position} , y_position = #{y_position} , record_length = #{record_length}, use_interval = #{use_interval} , filing_unit = #{filing_unit} , filing_date = #{filing_date} , remarks = #{remarks}
where sid = #{sid}
